action_title: Use repellents to reduce cable gnawing
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of using repellents to reduce cable gnawing. This study was in the USA.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
OTHER (1 STUDY)

Human-wildlife conflict (1 study): A randomized, replicated, controlled study in the USAÂ found that repellents only deterred cable gnawing by northern pocket gophers when encased in shrink-tubing.
